Quote: In 1971, after seven years in college, with that magic piece of paper clutched triumphantly in my fist, the best job I was able to get was night watchman on a sewer project in Babylon, N.Y. guarding a hole in the ground to prevent anyone from stealing it. God bless the American educational system!
Author: Spider Robinson,  The Callahan Chronicals (Callahan's Place Trilogy, #1-3)
